story_final_01_14000/2401_1201_0100_10:
Team Rocket has been taking over Pasio one
facility at a time.
story_final_01_14000/2401_1201_0200_10:
Red, Lear, and the Champions have been helping
out where they can, but...
story_final_01_14000/2401_1201_0300_10:
I don’t know how much longer even this center
will last...
story_final_01_14000/2401_1201_0600_10:
I have a rough idea what you’ve been feeling this
whole time while battling...
story_final_01_14000/2401_1201_0700_10:
And as long as you take responsibility and
reflect on what you did, I don’t plan on giving
any lectures.
story_final_01_14000/2401_1201_0800_10: But you can’t stay down in the dumps like this.
story_final_01_14000/2401_1201_0900_10: We’ve gotta figure out what to do next.
story_final_01_14000/2401_1201_1000_10:
I hope you can find the power within you to do
that—and to face your wrongdoings.
story_final_01_14000/2401_1201_1200_10: OK, I have to go now.
story_final_01_14000/2401_1201_1400_10:
I know... Croagunk’s injuries aren’t completely
healed yet, so I can’t use him in battle.
story_final_01_14000/2401_1201_1500_10:
But even if I’m on my own, I can still deliver a
couple of Potions!
story_final_01_14000/2401_1201_1600_10: I’ll support the sync pairs still fighting!
story_final_01_14000/2401_1201_1900_10: Paulo. Do you have a moment?
